![](End_of_field_season_2023.png)

Harvest has come to an end! I had a great time this summer. I learned how to drop seed in the research planter, collected images with UAVs, did hand pollinations in the nursery fields, and hand harvested 100s of ears. Overall, lots of fun with the Washburn Lab! **(September 2023)**
